Team Fortress classic одна из лучших игр хоть и старая и мало играков но в ней есть плюсы шпион может притвориться мёртвым инженер может чинить броню союзникам есть гранаты разных видов так же есть 4 команды не 2 а 4 красные синие жёлтые и зелёные для 4 команды есть специальный режим . Скаут может прикосновением раскрыть шпиона или разменировать гранаты подрывника .  И всего этого нету в Team Fortress 2 что очень жаль . А если ты хочешь поиграть в тфк а пинг большой скачайте и установите ботов пример foxbot одни из лучших .

I loved Team Fortress Two when I was REALLY little. But, after a few minutes of playing the game, even back then, I realized that the community is cancerous, and all have Type 1 "Leafy Syndrome".

This game I did not play much at all, but I got to play the classic version of a game I used to play, and I felt like that was enough for me.

It's like TF2, but nostalgia.

It's not worth a buy.  It really isn't good.  Less than 20 people play it at a time spread across about 3 or so servers.  Each one takes a few minutes to download the maps just to play on them, and even then, it's disappointing.  :(  You are much better off playing Team Fortress 2.

Still fun to play and it runs on every laptop I have, even one from  '07. It still is a well balanced game with defense and offence sided levels, like older games used to have. I wish I could play it with a 360 controller like I can with CSS but I can live with using a mouse.

Great game its just needs more people playing and servers with better ping. Other than that its a solid game. Team Fortress without all the nonsense of TF2. TF2 is great at the core just like this game, but the community and emphasis on cosmetics and superficial updates detracts from the game. The bare bones of TFC is what my $1.00 was well spent on. Even if I play for just 30 minutes and never play again it will be worth it in terms of $/Hours.

This game is really good. I'd highly reccommend buying this especially while it's on sale

Great game, it's 1990's fps in it's purest form. If you can look past the dated graphics, then you are in for a great time. 

- The community may be pretty small, but they are still humble and not totaly toxic. (Looking at you Fortress Forever)

- The classes are all well balanced. Except combat Medic and Scout who can go totaly ham when in the right hands.

- There are only a handful of constantly populated servers left, but when you find them it's really fun.

- Very high skill ceiling. It's the defenition of easy to learn, hard as balls to master. So if you want a rewarding and chalenging fps, then this is up your alley.

- Pretty dated graphics, but again, try your best to look past them.

- When the game is on sale it is dirt cheap. I picked it up for 1 dollar, worth every penny.


8/10 - Good game.

Hasn't aged the greatest, but still a great nostagla trip.

This game can be very challenging and frustrating at first, and is almost an entirely different game than Team Fortress 2. If you are an experienced TF2 player, do not expect to be able to walk right into this easily. This game was released in 1999, and there are people that started playing that year, and still play to this day. This is one of the main reasons this game is so difficult. However, I personally enjoy a challenge, and like TFC better than TF2. It just has the classic game design that I love. It also has a wider variety of practical strategies and more maps. Unfortunately though, it has a relatively small community and few servers. If you are questioning whether you'll buy this game or not, I highly recommend waiting until a Steam sale to do so.

半条命时代的“军团要塞”！！！简陋的建模也掩盖不了出色的游戏性，九种人物各有特点。
房间虽然不多也还有些，延迟从100ping到4、500ping皆有。
虽然是款好游戏，但错过了那个时代，真想体验还是去玩“军团要塞2”吧，steam上现在免费哦。

 A unica coisa que me deixou irritado é pelo fato de que se você é noob você não consegue jogar (ehuheuehueuhe) afinal, os unicos que jogam esse jogo hoje em dia são pessoas sem almas devotas ao satan.

Its actually a really cool game. It has many interesting  gameplay mechanics that arent in tf2.  One of my favorite features in this game is that a spy can play dead. This makes for many new crazy scenarios. So if you like tf2 you would love to see its ancestor. It explains why a lot of the cool features made it to tf2. So buy it
